mapper.select: select t.id, t.houseId, t.houseNumber, t.coveredArea, tt.name as typeName, ho.name as orientationName, sb.subwayName as subway, sb1.subwayName as station, ta1.name as provinceName, ta2.name as cityName from house_house t left join house_subway sb on t.subway = sb.id left join house_subway sb1 on t.station = sb1.id left join house_type tt on t.houseType=tt.id left join house_area ta1 on t.province=ta1.id left join house_area ta2 on t.city=ta2.id left join house_orientation ho on t.orientation=ho.id limit #{start},#{rows}
mapper.delete:
delete from house_house where id IN
#{houseIds}
